title: Uncorked Wine Festival - Los Angeles
desc: The inaugural Uncorked Wine Festival - Los Angeles will take place Jan 23rd, 2016 at beautiful Union Station, featuring over 50 wineries, food trucks, and music. General Admission ($55) will be from 6pm to 9pm and VIP admission ($65) will include an added hour from 5pm to 6pm. ?Both include wine tastings with food sold separately. For more information, please visit?http://uncorkedwinefestivals.com/losangeles/ ## Refunds are NOT available after Jan 16th. ?All attendees must be over 21. ?Cocktail attire requested.
